description: This is an example in English.
our-mission: The future of energy management is poised to undergo significant transformations due to advancements in technology, shifting energy demands, and the urgent need to address climate change. Our company explores the emerging trends in energy management, focusing on heat energy management, renewable energy integration, and energy storage solutions. Key innovations include the deployment of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) for predictive analytics, optimizing energy consumption, and reducing operational costs and special Thermal Management Systems. The role of decentralized energy systems, such as microgrids, is also highlighted as a critical driver in the evolution of energy management. Furthermore, the integration of renewable sources like solar, wind, and hydrogen with next-generation storage technologies, including batteries and hydrogen fuel cells, is discussed. Finally, our company addresses the importance of new technology and international cooperation to ensure a sustainable, resilient, and equitable energy future. The convergence of these factors positions energy management as a cornerstone of sustainable development in the 21st century.
introductory-paragraph: Thermal management is essential for improving the efficiency, stability, and economy of renewable energy systems, which are often intermittent. Effective thermal management helps store and utilize energy more efficiently, especially in renewable energy sources like solar and wind.
body-1-detail: Renewable energy generation is inconsistent, requiring effective energy storage. Thermal storage technology, such as high-temperature materials in solar systems, stores energy for later use, ensuring a stable energy supply despite fluctuations.
body-2-detail: Thermal management helps prevent energy waste by recovering and recycling heat from systems like solar panels and wind turbines, boosting overall energy efficiency and optimizing equipment performance.
body-3-detail: Renewable energy systems are vulnerable to fluctuations in weather conditions. Thermal management prevents overheating in solar panels and wind turbines, ensuring stable performance and extending equipment life.
body-4-detail: By improving energy efficiency, thermal management helps lower carbon emissions. In Concentrated Solar Power (CSP), for example, efficient heat storage and conversion reduce reliance on fossil fuels and mitigate climate change.
body-5-detail: Stable and cost-efficient thermal management makes renewable energy more accessible for industries and homes, such as solar water heating systems that save energy and reduce costs.
body-6-detail: Many renewable energy systems, like solar thermal and geothermal, produce both heat and electricity. Thermal management supports the integrated use of this energy in heating, cooling, and industrial processes, maximizing its potential.
conclusion-paragraph: In conclusion, thermal management companies play an important role in promoting the efficient production, storage, and utilization of renewable energy, thereby helping to develop the renewable energy market. They are essential partners that contribute to accelerating the energy transition and reducing carbon emissions while reducing energy loss and increasing the stability of the system.

products.title: Why SCS?
products.description: The reason why thermal management is necessary for batteries is because it has a significant impact on the performance, lifespan, safety, and efficiency of the battery. The battery generates heat during the charging and discharging process, and if this heat is not properly managed, various problems can occur.

item1.name: 1. Ensuring safety
item1.content: If the battery overheats, it can lead to fire or explosion. In particular, thermal runaw ay can occur in high-energy density batteries such as lithium-ion batteries, which is a phenomenon in which the temperature of the battery rapidly increases and beco mes uncontrollable. A thermal management system is essential to prevent this. Saf ety can be secured by maintaining the temperature of the battery at an appropriat e level.

item2.name: 2. Extending battery life
item2.content: The performance and lifespan of a battery are greatly affected by temperature. If th e battery is too hot or too cold, the chemical reaction speed changes, which deteri orates the battery performance, and repeated thermal stress can damage the che mical components of the battery, shortening its lifespan. For example, lithium-ion batteries operate most efficiently in the 20-30°C range, and beyond this range, perf ormance degradation and shortened lifespan accelerate. Therefore, thermal mana gement is very important for maintaining the long-term performance of the batter y.

item3.name: 3. Maintaining Efficiency
item3.content: If the temperature of the battery is too high or too low, the charging and dischargin g efficiency decreases. At low temperatures, the electrolyte inside the battery does not move well, so the electrical resistance increases, which slows down the chargi ng and discharging speed and reduces the energy density. On the other hand, at hi gh temperatures, the chemical reaction inside the battery becomes too fast, resulti ng in inefficient energy consumption. Thermal management prevents this situatio n and helps the battery maintain optimal efficiency.

item4.name: 4. Ensuring Performance Uniformity
item4.content: It is important for a battery pack composed of multiple battery cells to maintain th e temperature of each cell evenly. If the temperature difference between battery ce Ils becomes large, the performance and lifespan of the cells become uneven, whic h leads to a decrease in the performance of the entire battery pack. By maintaining the temperature of each cell evenly through thermal management, the performanc e of the battery pack can be maintained stably.

item5.name: 5. Optimizing Performance under High-Load Conditions
item5.content1: In high-load applications such as electric vehicles or energy storage devices, the battery must handle high curre nts, which generates a lot of heat. If proper thermal management is not implemented at this time, the battery may overheat, resulting in reduced performance or abnormal system shutdown. Effective thermal managemen t is essential to maintain stable performance even under high load conditions.
item5.content2: In conclusion, battery thermal management is a key factor in ensuring safety, performance, life, and efficiency. I t is important to optimize battery performance and ensure long-term safe use by maintaining the battery's oper ating temperature appropriately.

companyInfo.companyDescription: SCS, short for Standard Cooling Systems, is an A.I. computing development platform specializing in the design of high efficiency Thermal Management Systems.
companyInfo.longDescription: SCS is committed to using the highest technical design capabilities to create innovations with unique high-efficiency cooling system design technologies and A.I. development know-how. Since its establishment in September 2021, SCS has received 1.3 billion won in investment so far, and is tasked with bringing innovative changes to the Electric charging market. Despite its relatively young age, SCS has achieved numerous degrees of success. SCS is not just about designing the best cooling systems but with new technologies we are focused to make a difference in the industry. SCS is a game changer. We believe in complete communication within our company to ensure a smooth flow of information from top to bottom.
companyInfo.advancementsTitle: SCS is continually proving its ability by conducting advancements in
companyInfo.techDevelopment: We are working to develop the best technology in the industry
companyInfo.paradigmShift: We want to lead a paradigm shift in the electrification sector such as
companyInfo.industries: charging industries, electric boats, and electric heavy industries

fastChargerCooling.titleSection1: 20% Reduce Charging Time 100% Dust & Humidity removed

safeguardingBatteryHealth.title: Safeguarding Battery Health
safeguardingBatteryHealth.content: Effective thermal management is crucial for electric vehicle quick chargers to prevent overheating and protect the vehicle's battery. This ensures the battery maintains optimal performance and extends its lifespan, reducing the need for costly replacements.

fasterChargingTimes.title: Faster Charging Times
fasterChargingTimes.content: Thermal regulation allows quick chargers to operate at their maximum power output without triggering safety shutdowns due to heat buildup. This enables faster charging speeds, reducing the time required to fully replenish an electric vehicle's battery.

improvedReliability.title: Improved Reliability
improvedReliability.content: Robust thermal management systems help maintain the structural integrity and performance of quick charger components, minimizing the risk of failures or malfunctions. This enhances the overall reliability and availability of the charging infrastructure, providing a seamless charging experience for electric vehicle owners.

providesStability.title: PROVIDES STABILITY
providesStability.content:
High-power fast chargers have overheating problems. 
 
 Effective thermal management to prevent fire and explosion. Ensuring user safety.

reduceChargingTime.title: REDUCE CHARGING TIME
reduceChargingTime.content: Fast charger thermal management to reduce charging time. Maximum output can be maintained without overheating, providing user convenience.

improveSystemEfficiency.title: IMPROVE SYSTEM EFFICIENCY
improveSystemEfficiency.content: Thermal management ensures the stability of electronic parts of the fast charger. Increase power conversion efficiency and increase energy efficiency of the entire system.

fastChargerCooling.titleSection3: BENEFIT OF SCS THERMAL MANGEMENT SYSTEM
